restrictions.post-queue-rep-threshold: Reputation required to bypass comment queue
restrictions.groups-exempt-from-post-que: Select groups that should be exempt from the comment queue
restrictions.post-queue-help: Enabling comment queue will put the comments of new users in a queue for approval
restrictions-new.post-queue-help: Enabling new user restrictions will set restrictions on comments created by new users
restrictions.seconds-edit-after: Number of seconds a comment remains editable (set to 0 to disable)
restrictions.seconds-delete-after: Number of seconds a comment remains deletable (set to 0 to disable)
restrictions.replies-no-delete: Number of replies after users are disallowed to delete their own posts (set to 0 to disable)
restrictions.days-until-stale: Days until post is considered stale
restrictions.stale-help: If a post is considered "stale", then a warning will be shown to users who attempt to reply to that post. (set to 0 to disable)
timestamp.cut-off-help:
Dates & times will be shown in a relative manner (e.g. "3 hours ago" / "5 days ago"), and localised into various languages. After a certain point, this text can be switched to display the localised date itself (e.g. 5 Nov 2016 15:30).
(Default: 30, or one month). Set to 0 to always display dates, leave blank to always display relative times.
timestamp.necro-threshold-help: A message will be shown between comments if the time between them is longer than the necro threshold. (Default: 7, or one week). Set to 0 to disable.
timestamp.topic-views-interval-help: Post views will only increment once every X minutes as defined by this setting.
teaser.last-post: Last – Show the latest comment, including the original comment, if no replies
teaser.last-reply: Last – Show the latest reply, or a "No replies" placeholder if no replies
showPostPreviewsOnHover: Show a preview of comments when mouse overed
unread.min-track-last: Minimum comments in post before tracking last read
recent.categoryFilter.disable: Disable filtering of posts in ignored categories on the /recent page
composer-help:
The following settings govern the functionality and/or appearance of the post composer shown
				to users when they create new posts, or reply to existing posts.
composer.enable-plugin-help: Allow plugins to add content to the help tab
backlinks.help: If a comment references another post, a link back to the comment will be inserted into the referenced post at that point in time.
